org.kepler.provenance.opm

Class OpenProvenanceModelXML

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.kepler.provenance.Recording
      • org.kepler.provenance.opm.OpenProvenanceModelXML
  • Deprecated. 
    This recording output is no longer used. Instead, use ProvRecording.

    @Deprecated
public class OpenProvenanceModelXML
extends Recording
    A Recording for Open Provenance Model XML.
    Author:
    Daniel Crawl
